tool_description: Create an account, fund an account, manage a catalog, send rewards and get reporting — all available on demand, in real time and as a service. With our RaaS® API, you can elegantly knit a sophisticated rewards program into your platform. Best of all, the service has zero fees.
name: Rewards as a Service
title: Rewards as a Service

api_list.name: 4. Get list of rewards
api_list.description: Gets the list of rewards available for the platform
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the rewards currently available on the platform?
I want to see the full list of rewards that I can choose from right now.
Please provide the catalog of rewards offered by the service at this moment.
What rewards can I access through the platform today?
List all the rewards that are available for redemption on the platform.
Could you fetch the current rewards inventory for me?
Show me the rewards options that I can send to users right now.
I need to get the latest list of rewards offered by the rewards service.
Retrieve all the rewards that are available to be sent through the platform.
Give me an overview of all rewards currently listed in the system.

api_list.name: 2. Get Account Information
api_list.description: Get the information for an account created under a Customer

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the details for the account named PlatinumRewards under the customer GlobalTech Solutions?

Retrieve the details for the account named TechSavvyPoints linked to the customer Digital Horizons.
Get the account information for the account called EliteClub associated with the customer Nova Corp.
Please provide the details of the account named RewardsPlus for the customer Horizon Ventures.
I need the information for the account called LoyaltyStars under the customer BrightPath Solutions.
Could you look up the account details for the account named PremiumPoints linked to the customer Summit Technologies?

api_list.name: 6. Get order information
api_list.description: Get more information about an order

Please provide the order information for the order ID GiftTxn753.
Can you look up the details for the order with the ID PromoTxn456?

api_list.name: 7. Get order history
api_list.description: Get more information about all the orders placed on this customer and account

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the order history for customer GreenTech Solutions on the account named RewardsPlus?
I need the order history for customer BrightFuture Inc. on the account LoyaltyRewards starting from January 1st, 2024.
Please provide the order history for customer Stellar Enterprises with the account ID PremiumRewards up to March 15, 2024.
Could you get the order history for customer Horizon Tech on the account named EliteRewards from February 1, 2024 to February 28, 2024?
Show me all orders placed by customer Nova Innovations on the account called StarRewards.
I want to see the order history for customer Apex Solutions on the account named PrimeRewards starting from April 10, 2024.
Get the order history for customer Quantum Dynamics on the account called UltraRewards up to May 5, 2024.
Retrieve the order history for customer BlueWave Corp on the account named MegaRewards from March 1, 2024 to March 31, 2024.
Can you pull up the order history for customer SolarTech on the account called InfinityRewards?
Please provide the order history for customer Vertex Solutions on the account named PlatinumRewards up to June 20, 2024.

api_list.name: 5. Place an order for a reward
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/orders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/orders"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: I want to order a reward for my employee recognition program.
Can you help me place an order for a gift card reward?
Please process an order for a reward to be sent to my customer.
I need to order a reward for a recent sales achievement.
Could you place an order for a reward as part of our loyalty program?
I want to send a reward to a top performer, can you place the order?
Please order a reward for the winner of our monthly contest.
I would like to place an order for a reward to thank a valued client.
Can you arrange an order for a reward to be delivered to my team member?
Help me place an order for a reward to celebrate a project milestone.

utterances.utterance: I want to set up a new rewards account for my business.
Can you help me create an account to start using the rewards service?
Please register a new account so I can manage my rewards program.
I need to open an account to begin sending rewards to my customers.
Create a new account for me to integrate the rewards platform.
Set up an account so I can fund it and start rewarding users.

Please help me establish a new account for the rewards program.
Can you create an account so I can manage my rewards catalog?
I’d like to create an account to get started with the rewards API.
